product_name: Bella Band Bundle: Apparel
title: Life-saver for early pregnancy
review_text:
I am so happy I got these bands! When I first noticed my clothes weren't fitting anymore (around 11 weeks), I went maternity clothes shopping and was completely discouraged by the lack of clothes for early pregnancy. When I got my Bella Bands, I automatically felt better about myself! So far, they have four fabulous functions that have been a life-saver:
1. Make shorter, non-maternity shirts appear longer so you can wear them for longer
2. Allow you to wear non-maternity pants with the button undone - even jeans!
3. Hold the bands of maternity pants up so you can wear those earlier.
4. Keep everything tucked in a supported so you feel more confident and less flabby.
So far, I'm wearing them tucked over once, but I'm sure later in my pregnancy I will expand them to full size and they'll be an added comfort and peace of mind. EVERY newly pregnant woman needs to get these by month 3!!

product_name: Bella Band Bundle: Apparel
title: Totally worth it!
review_text: When I first purchased a bella band, it was with my 1st pregnancy and I was still very small in frame to fit into ANY maternity clothes, but my old clothes just didn't fit. I reluctantly bought a bella band (at a salesperson's suggestion) thinking that it would be one of those products that I would come to regret spending so much money on. Surprisingly, it was the best thing I purchased when I was pregnant. I actually was able to get away with not buying any maternity clothes and just wearing my old clothing but with the pants or jeans unzipped and unbuttoned. In the last month, however, I had to wear more stretchy clothes- even my jeans would not fit with the bella band. But it is great because you can have it peek out from under the shirt you are wearing for a layered look. It is just a great product. Can't say enough good things about it. I am now pregnant with my 2nd child and have used the same bella band. It really keeps its elasticity. Overall, it was really worth it's weight in gold because I saved myself from buying so many maternity clothes

product_name: Bella Band Bundle: Apparel
title: A pregnancy MUST HAVE!
review_text:
These bands are incredible and a must have for all pregnant women! I work a corporate job and did not want to buy a whole new wardrobe of pants, so I wear the bella bands every day with my work pants unzipped and no-one can tell. They look like you are wearing a tight camisole and even help to streamline unwanted pregnancy love handles! I bought the 3 pack and have worn all of them several times. I literally wear them everyday. They are really comfortable and definitely buy the next size up - I "was" a size 6-8 and a size two is perfect. Fold them over in half for a tighter fit or wear the top half over your tummy like a cummerbund so it keeps warm in winter!! I am 20 wks and have been wearing them for 3 weeks now, so buy them as soon as you start having to undo that top button!!

They are really good quality and I washed and put mine the dryer by accident and it didnt even shrink. Worth every cent!

product_name: Bella Band Bundle: Apparel
title: Great Buy - Great Look!
review_text:
I am so happy with my Bella Band bundle purchase, and so happy I bought the pack of 3.  I was hesitant to spend the money on these but after searching the net for this and similar products figured I'd give it a try.  
BUY THESE EARLY LADIES!  I waited until my 24th week to buy the bands and today slipped on a pair of pants I haven't worn in 2 months, unbuttoned and unzipped even, but nobody could tell with the bella band on.  The look was cute and layered and not bunchy.  The nice material even felt great under my shirt and no more belly button 'hole' showing!
I'm going up to my 'skinny clothes' box to pull out items I can wear with my bella band on. I'm so excited to use this now and post-pregnancy.
PS - they even came with a nice surprise bag of Skittles, heaven to me

product_name: Chicago Bears Touchdown Long Sleeve T-Shirt: Apparel
title: Da Bears
review_text: I love this long sleeve, I got it quickly, it fit, and it's Da Bears.

product_name: Chicago Bears Touchdown Long Sleeve T-Shirt: Apparel
title: Very nice shirt.
review_text: I bought this.  The colors are great, the fit is great.  I highly recommend it

product_name: Chicago Bears Touchdown Long Sleeve T-Shirt: Apparel
title: Great Design, Poor Quality
review_text: This shirt is one of a kind.  It was the only dark navy shirt with a large Chicago Bears logo on it that I could find.  It was a little large for me, but looked great the first time I wore it.  However, after just one wash, some of the logo started peeling off!  I can't imagine what this shirt will look like after next season, probably will just be a navy long sleeve shirt...buy this shirt with caution

product_name: Chicago Bears Touchdown Long Sleeve T-Shirt: Apparel
title: Chicago Bearns Touchdown Long Sleeve T-Shirt
review_text: The shirt had a small hole in it when it arrive

product_name: Jerzees Cotton/Poly Sweatpants (No Pockets): Apparel
title: GREAT FIT  ~  CORRRECT SIZE
review_text: I love these sweats.  The only drawback I find is that they do not have pockets.  However, most sweat pants don't have pockets, so I am used to that.  They fit great - but then again, I ordered the correct size and did not count on my washing machine to 'turn them into the (right) size.

product_name: Jerzees Cotton/Poly Sweatpants (No Pockets): Apparel
title: HORRIFYING FIT, HORRIBLE QUALITY!!!!!!!!!!!!!
review_text:
I had several of these shipped to my Mum in law's in California for sending to me in France where we work and live. Because of a decent delivery speed, and her thinking they looked OK, I gave them a rating of 5 Stars.

Today, after even having BOILED them in water, hoping for shrinkage, I am sad to say that nothing happened.

They are horrid to wear, I oredered size small for all colours, and the fit is that of XXXXXXXL.

DO NOT BUY THIS HORRORS. I wish I could get my hard earned money back, as now I'm wondering if I was the brunt of a joke in Nightmare Alley.

You've got to be con artist to sell these things

product_name: Brandon Thomas Men's Twill Barnie Jacket: Apparel
title: Good Product
review_text: It looks excellent. My girlfriend said I looked more 'mature' in this jacket. The only thing is 14.99$ is a little expensive.

product_name: Brandon Thomas Men's Twill Barnie Jacket: Apparel
title: Pretty nice jacket, but some sizing issues
review_text: This is a nice jacket at a very nice price. The trouble I had with it is that I generally wear a medium and this jacket would have also fit me best as a medium. So, what's the issue then? The problem lies in the sleeve length. I had to get a large because the sleeves would have been too short at medium size. Now, it looks a tad over-sized at the chest and waist, but I rather have that than too-short sleeves. Also, I purchased the brown jacket, and it is a lighter shade of brown than what appears in the picture

product_name: flare jeans: Apparel
title: Awesome baby jeans
review_text: I love these little jeans. They look fantastic on my daughter. I love that they are plain, without any embellishments. She's a skinny little thing and these jeans actually fit and stay up on her. I probably wash then twice a week, but they are holding up really well! These are the best kids jeans I've ever seen.

product_name: little star stretchie: Apparel
title: Great PJs
review_text: These are all-cotton and they hold up really well. We received some that were owned by another family of three boys before they were handed down to us. The hand-me-down PJs were the only ones that ever got holes. Stains seem to come out really well too. I haven't had any of the problems that were listed by other reviewers

product_name: little star stretchie: Apparel
title: Great sleeper!
review_text: I'm a mom with 3 kids. All I can say is that I wish I had some of these sleepers when my oldest was a baby, the zipper design is very convenient, I highly recomend it

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: Inexpensive leather boots
review_text: I could not ask for more for these boots, the price, quality (strong leather) and design. After all, Charles David is a high-end shoe designer and I got these for $59.99 and they're "worth" $259.00. However, if you have wide feet, prepare to having to take these boots to the shoemaker to be stretched. I'll never buy shoes that I intend to wear very often from Guess? again

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: Pleased!
review_text: These are really good boots.  I am definitely glad, however, that I read the reviews before I bought them and ordered a half size bigger, or they would have been extremely tight.  They actually were even a bit tight even at the bigger size, but they have stretched and are quite comfortable. The only thing that annoys me a bit is they are tighter on the calf than any other boots I have purchased.  I solve for that by only zipping them up about 3/4 of the way.  Otherwise, I am happy with them. I didn't think I would like the rounded toe as much as the square, but have gotten use to it and like it

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: Good quality but Beware
review_text:
Due to the previous reviews, I did buy these a 1/2 size bigger but they're still tight in the ankle which is strange to me because I have bigger legs but small-ish ankles...I'm hoping they break in though. The quality is nice and they smell pretty good but the sole is INDEED SLICK!!! I would NOT want to wear these boots anywhere treacherous and have already slipped on a rainy sidewalk so beware.

*Oh, and one more thing...the toe box is VERY rounded and not exactly what I'd hoped for but the square toe CD shoes were $40 more and got HORRIBLE reviews across the board for quality.

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: The Perfect Boot
review_text: I received my boots yesterday and I love them! They are very feminine. I was happy I read other's reviews prior to ordering my boots, I am typically between sizes and I order the larger size. The larger size fits like a glove with trouser socks but thicker socks would make them too tight. Thanks to everyone who wrote a review

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: Way Cute!!!!!
review_text:
I just got these boots in black and absolutely love them!!  Too cute!!  They look great for work and with jeans!! I can finally throw my old ones out!! YIPEE!!! I would buy them in brown too if they had my size.

It was a good thing I read the reviews because they do run very small.  I normally wear a 6 or 6 1/2 and I bought these in a 7 and they fit perfect

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: What a joke!
review_text: What a joke! I baught it for my girlfriend and just got it today by UPS. When I opened the box, I found there is a huge crack on the sole. Also there is a scratch on the leather. The workmanship is not so good too. I'm going to return it. Still not sure if I have to pay the shipment by myself.

product_name: Charles by Charles David Women's Chit Chat Boot: Apparel
title: CUTE CUTE CUTE!
review_text: CUTE CUTE CUTE! Runs true to size, which is kind of small by Charles David standards (CD usually runs bigger), so buy your regular, non-charles david size. GREAT boots for everyday wear, and very comfortable even with the high heel, due to the rounded toe and platform. Good material and construction. Interestingly, these boots are made in China, not the usual Spain.

product_name: Azaleia Deco: Apparel
title: Satisfied
review_text: These sandals are very bright in color, and surprisingly comfortable, there is extra cushion for walking.  Good summer shoe.  Delivery was prompt

product_name: Azaleia Deco: Apparel
title: 5 stars
review_text: I was plesantly surprised at the comfort of the shoes and speedy delivery

product_name: Azaleia Deco: Apparel
title: Azaleia Deco sandal
review_text: I just received these sandals today and they are so cute and comfortable.  I had ordered Azaleia Fab last year and they were too narrow, so I was afraid that these would be the same.  They are not the same.  They are wider and fit my feet just right.  I have a medium width foot and they are very comfortable and can't wait to wear them with shorts and pants. Cute!

product_name: Reef Ginger Sandal - Women's: Apparel
title: very good and sexy
review_text: my girlfrind love this sandals , they are very good looking , confortable and easy to clean

product_name: Reef Ginger Sandal - Women's: Apparel
title: reef sandles
review_text: all was great, although i thought  the shiping was to much, other then that, it was all good

product_name: Dickies Men's Traditional Work Pant: Apparel
title: pants
review_text: It is hard to find pants for my son, but Dickies have pants that fit, wear well, and cost a fair price

product_name: Original Taxi Wallet: Apparel
title: Best wallet I've ever owned
review_text: Been carrying the same Taxi brand wallet for about 5 years.  Well made, durable and takes up very little room in my purse.  Highly recommended!

product_name: Original Taxi Wallet: Apparel
title: Well Made-Super Functional
review_text:
I've had this wallet now for about a year. It is the most handy, functional wallet I've ever  used. The two seperate cash pockets are great. I use one for receipts for business and one for checks and cash.When the wallet is snapped close, there is an external slot pocket that works great for ID and credit cards. I routinely carry a few quarters and dimes for parking meters in the coin pouch. 
Very comfortable to wear and classic styling that looks great when you pull it out. I imagine this may be the last wallet I ever purchase

product_name: CERULEAN iCandy iPod Video 30, 60/80GB Official Apple Skins. Belt-Clip+Stand 4 Vibrent Colors: Apparel
title: It is ok.
review_text: The description of the item said it came with I-Pod face/screen protection, but it did not.  I emailed the customer service team at cover case with hopes to return the item, but they told me instead they would send me the screen protection and never did.  After waiting 2 weeks, I emailed back the costumer service and asked that they either send the screen protection or directions on how to send the item back.  It has now been a month and they have failed to correspond, so I decided to just deal with the fact I spent money on a case that didn't have what I wanted.  I've been using it, and the rest of it is ok, although, the silicone fits weird on the top and sometimes it bunches up, making it hard to toggle the hold switch.  I'll probably by a new, better case soon. Oh well

product_name: CERULEAN iCandy iPod Video 30, 60/80GB Official Apple Skins. Belt-Clip+Stand 4 Vibrent Colors: Apparel
title: Perfect product
review_text: When I excercied I carry my iPod in my hand.  So, I needed a cover that would take the wear and tear of my running - this is the exact product that I needed.  It is easy to get on and off and it provides an excellent gripe

product_name: CERULEAN iCandy iPod Video 30, 60/80GB Official Apple Skins. Belt-Clip+Stand 4 Vibrent Colors: Apparel
title: Rubbish!
review_text: The rubber does not go around the screen, and is generally poorly designed. The bit of sticky backed plastic thet supply to go onto the screen leaves bubbles of air on the screen. I shall now be ordering the official Apple one in the hope that that is a lot better than this thing. Hope that helps

product_name: Columbia Sportswear Women's Celestial Spring Parka: Apparel
title: Much nicer then the picture
review_text: This is a nice waist-length jacket. It is warm  but not too thick, probably to 40 degree weather. It felt true to size.  The color I got was purple frost and it was a very nice color. It had a lot of pockets. Great deal

product_name: Roll Down Yoga Pant by Hard Tail: Apparel
title: I love these
review_text: I bought these pants recently and I notice that I do more laundry so that I'll be able to wear THESE pants to as many yoga classes as possible. They are awesome

product_name: Roll Down Yoga Pant by Hard Tail: Apparel
title: These Roll Down Yoga Pants are AWESOME!
review_text: I have to say that these are probably the best yoga pants that I have.  I love the fit even after many washings.  I have been partically concerned about the length and the length on these pants are great.  I would highly recommend.

product_name: Roll Down Yoga Pant by Hard Tail: Apparel
title: Hardtail
review_text: I bought the hardtail pants and I do like the way these pants fit.  But I really don't like that they fade pretty quickly.  I will buy them again. I buy bebe sport and I have to say their pants are pretty good they don't fades as quickly.  I notice with their pants they either fit perfectly or they are too long and don't fit as good.  I want to try the SO LOW pants

product_name: Roll Down Yoga Pant by Hard Tail: Apparel
title: Great yoga pant
review_text: I've been looking for a roll down yoga pant for a long time and have always been disappointed.  They're either too long, too tight or too loose around the waist.  These are perfect!  They are comfortable and continue to look good after many washings (though the color does fade a little, but that's normal).  I am about to buy my second pair...

product_name: Bearpaw Women's Suede & Shearling Clog - Style 460 Aspen: Apparel
title: Wonderful, Fashionable Suede Clogs!
review_text: I have these clogs in the chocoloate color, they look great!  The sheepskin lining is very soft and looks adorable. They go with SO many of my outfits! Plus they can worn be with or without socks

product_name: Women's Fleece Clog Slippers: Apparel
title: Warm Feet
review_text: Good quality.  Comfortable.  Color as shown on-line.  Well fitted.  Very satisfied with style of fit.

product_name: Women's Fleece Clog Slippers: Apparel
title: Exactly as described.
review_text: Shopping with Land's End has always been a pleasure. These slippers are exactly as described and delightful to wear. My trust in Land's End continues

product_name: Women's Fleece Clog Slippers: Apparel
title: Love mine
review_text:
I love these slippers...my favorites so far.  I chose these for the soles, so I could run outside if I needed to (mailbox, trash).  I toss them in the washing machine and the dryer.

Two complaints:  They make my feet a bit sweaty and hold on to smells, so my feet get smelly....so I throw them in the washing machine more often than I probably should.  Also, the back of the heel is smushed from my wearing them, and I can't get it to stay 'un-smushed'

product_name: Women's Fleece Clog Slippers: Apparel
title: Wonderful Slippers
review_text: These slippers are wonderful. They really are warm, and they are strong and supportive enough for you to go outside in them...like to get the mail....the soles are thick enough, so if you step on a rock you won't get hurt. When they get dirty you can throw them in the wash with all your other clothes, and theyu come out like new. I recomend puting them in the dryer though, to bring them back to their "brand-new" quality, even though they do dry just fine without a dryer. The only reason thses slippers are not 5 stars is because they tend to hold smells, so the inside footbet can get kinda smelly after a while. but despite this I strongly reccomend these slippers.

product_name: Women's Fleece Clog Slippers: Apparel
title: Charcoal Heather
reviewer: Rebecca Johnson "The Rebecca Review, finding beauty in the world - www.SeasonedwithLove.com"
review_text:
The soft fuzzy fleece is comforting and keeps your feet especially warm. They are also washable. You can toss these in the washer. 

I don't put them in the dryer, just in a bag and run them through the washer. They dry fast just sitting on 
the dryer. 

Favorite color: Charcoal Heather, but the other colors 
look especially tempting tonight. It may be time 
for a second pair. 

~The Rebecca Revie

product_name: Kenneth Cole "Distressed Call" Flat Front Pant: Apparel
title: Perfect for weekend hangout
review_text: I bought three different colors of these pants.  Give you a sleek look with slim fit

product_name: Skechers Women's Headway E2 Sneaker: Apparel
title: Skechers Women's Headway E2 Sneaker
review_text: I love these! So comfortable, price great, looks good, very happy!  If you are looking for a great walking shoe this is it.  Will buy again in the future & would highly recommend.

product_name: Skechers Women's Headway E2 Sneaker: Apparel
title: Scetchers Headway sneaker
review_text: I purchased this sneaker for the beginning of school. I am a teachers aide and I have many classes that I work in. I have to do a lot of walkin in my job and I have troubled feet. These sneakers are very comfortable and I only wish that you made them in black patent leather so I could wear them as a dress shoe :) Thanks so much

product_name: Skechers Men's Tap Boot: Apparel
title: The most comfortable boots I ever owned
review_text: I'm a boot guy. My family and I just got back from a four day trip to Washington DC. We walked many many miles in those four days, visiting all the museums, monuments, the White House and everything in between. My Skechers Tap Boots were the only pair of shoes I took with me. In any other pair of boots my feet would have been killing me by the end of each day. I can honestly say that never happened. These are the most comfortable boots that I have ever owned. The look and quality is 5 star too. When this pair wears out, I'm definetly buying another

product_name: Nautica Sleepwear Men's St. Andrew's Plaid Flannel Long Sleeve Shirt: Apparel
title: dealer ok
review_text:
they sent wrong size. i called they sent correct size pronto. no return needed
size chart had wrong inf

product_name: Men's Regular Short Sleeve Solid 60/40 Cotton/Polyester Oxford Shirt: Apparel
title: Needs Better Packaging
review_text:
I'm happy with the shirts from Land's End.

The package arrived in very rough condition. There were about 5 large holes in the packaging and I could see the shirts through the holes.

The package survived either rough handling or possibly being tampered with enroute.

I don't know if I'll order from them again because of the packaging

product_name: Men's Regular Short Sleeve Solid 60/40 Cotton/Polyester Oxford Shirt: Apparel
title: Good quality, good price
review_text: I've been wearing this shirt on a regular basis and after a number of washes it still looks good.

product_name: NEW! Lightweight Full-Length Raincoat: Apparel
title: Great dressy raincoat
review_text: I bought this raincoat for my father, who is of the generation that regularly wears such long coats.  He loves it and has been wearing it since Christmas.    It wind resistant, water beads up quickly and it's good looking.  It was a great buy

product_name: Jockey No Panty Line Promise String Bikini: Apparel
title: Jockey No-Lines
review_text: This underwear is great and doesn't give you lines.  The problem is that you can't expect it to last very long.  The problem is the elastic which is a very flat band of some type of rubber-y material--  It just doesn't last very long.  It usually ends up breaking at some point after a few months,  and I NEVER dry these in the dryer either.  Nonetheless, it is still just about all  that I wear under most pants, because I hate "butt floss.

product_name: Jockey No Panty Line Promise String Bikini: Apparel
title: They live up to their promise
review_text: I have more than 10 pairs of this Jockey No Panty Line Underwear.  I don't like wearing thong underwear, but don't want visible panty lines either.  So these are perfect. Jockey makes this underwear out of two different fabrics.  I prefer the ones made out of "Tactel Nylon and Lycra Spandex."  There's another version made out of a fabric called "Model."  That fabric tends to develop little balls and they take forever to dry.  Enjoy

product_name: Bunny Slippers: Apparel
title: don't buy these slippers
review_text: i know they're cute bunnies, but the hole to put your foot in is to small to actually put your foot in.  i don't know who designed these things, but they didn't think it through.  i ended up sending mine back, so after tax i paid about $15 for them,  then i shipped them back for another $6,  and i got refunded $9.99.  WTF

product_name: Rolfs Squeeze Coin Pouch: Apparel
title: squeeze the jingle out of your pocket change
review_text: The Rolfs squeeze coin pouch is easy to use and works great to keep your change handy. However, it also eliminates that annoying jingle of loose change rattling around in your pocket everytime you take a step making it sound like you're rattling a length of chain

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: Great dress- great price
review_text: I love this dress.  It's adorable, not too short (I'm 5 7 and everything is too short) and looks great with leggings.  It's very deconstructed- but that is OBVIOUS from the picture.  I wore it over a tank and w/ leggings- it was very cute and not too over the top 80s for someone who has worn the stuff the first time around.  Also- the seller is great- fast shipping for a small company- and very customer oriented- they have great response time from a REAL PERSON- not an automated system- almost unheard of in online shopping!  I have 2 and am going to order another one

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: Cute and easy
review_text: I bought this shirt 3 weeks ago and love it so much I ordered 4 more.  Its cheap and super comfortable. It can be dressed up for work, worn casual with jeans, over a bathing suit, or even as a night gown after a long night out.  Its a great piece for the summer. Does run a bit small, the gray is a lot darker then the photo shows, and isnt the highest quailty shirt I own, but come on, it's $9.  All that said, I love this dress and its a great base peice to build many cute looks

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: Quality Item
review_text: I love this dress, but think it is a junior cut.  I will wear it with tights, I think.  The material, color, and structure of this dress is very, very nice; I know I will have fun wearing the dress.  However, had I known each item I bought had separate shipping charges, I may not have made any purchases.  The s&h on a few items were as much or more than the item cost.  Of course, this is not this seller's fault and I thank him for this quality item

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: Great fit!
review_text:
When I first received my dress/shirt I was dumbfounded! It looked like someone had just cut the sleeves and made a hole on top of a plain sheet of fabric! What it is this thing?! But once I got home and tried it one it was perfect! It was fitted along the waist and loose on the top. It looks nice with leggings! I tried to wear it on it's own around the house, but it is too short, although very sexy.
I do not blame the other customers who did not appreciate the cut or style of the dress/shirt. Just like what the other customer said, " you probably would not like it if you've never shopped at American Apparel before." Also, 
I wouldn't recommend this on someone who is skinny. I don't think it would look the way it should on you. And when I say skinny I mean Nicole Richie- scarecrow skinny.

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: lovvve itt
review_text: great fit, great cut, great fabric, great color. comfortable - dress, t shirt, dress up/down. its perfec

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: J.Gu.
review_text: It's a cute dress. Looks good over jeans. Anyone who has a problem with the cut of it has probably never shopped at American Apparel before. It's worth the 9 bucks

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: duh
review_text: I dont understand why people are complaining about this dress. First of all I went to the American apparel store and the style is meant to be "trendy" aka the bottom was cut and it wasnt sewn together. so dont blame Andrew for the "quality". and if you paid $9 for a dress dont expect designer stuff. its a basic t-shirt dress, it looks cute, it is on the small side, the edges are cut but not finished, you get what you pay for!!

product_name: American Apparel Women's Fine Jersey Sleeveless T-Shirt Dress: Apparel
title: Not worth it!
review_text: I bought the jersey shirt, thinking that it would look really cute over jeans.  When I opened the package I was apalled!! It looked like a pillow case with holes for sleeves.  The edges weren't stitched and the fabric was thin and cheap looking.  I have yet to return this item...I will not buy from this company again!

product_name: Classic Leather Ballet Flats: Apparel
title: Great Shoe
review_text: I just got this shoe and it's awesome. It comes about a 1/2 size too big though. Nice leather and sooo comfy. There is actually a little padded arch support. Great shoe

product_name: Samsonite Travel Accessories TSA 4-Dial Combination Lock - Set of 2: Apparel
title: Pretty much useless
review_text: My TSA cut it off the very first time I tried it.  Locks pretty much need to be disposable, not "special."  The "TSA" approved thing is a somewhat cruel joke.  Not all luggage is opened any more, and if your lock survives, it is likely only because it wasn't inspected and any lock would have.  If you are inspected it is unlikely the TSA people will bother rooting around for the TSA tool, at least as far as my statistical data indicates.  If flying into the US from a foreign country, use the cheapest disposable lock you can find.  If flying outbound, if you tape a lock or a zip tie inside your luggage with a note for the TSA, they have, in my experience, resealed my luggage after inspection

product_name: VANITY-2010 4" Classic Plain Knee Boot Side Zip Available in 4 Colors: Apparel
title: Nice boots.
review_text: These boots look great and are pretty comfortable.  The only problem is they are not good for walking much because of the heel, but the fit is very good.  I was impressed overall with them

product_name: Jockey "No Panty Line Promise" Modal Lace-Trim Camisole: Apparel
title: So comfy...
review_text: I purchased one of these a while ago and I just fell in love with it. I have since purchased a few more from Amazon. They so comfy and silky and I really love the design, how it sits higher on the chest. They are also very stretchy and not binding at all. Definitely my favorite camisole.

product_name: Lewis N. Clark Clothesline: Apparel
title: Very useful travel tool
review_text: A very useful thing to travel with. The suction cups were absolutely worthless--would fall as soon as anything was placed on the line and sometimes even if nothing was placed on the line--, but since you can wrap the line around something and hook it to itself, that's not too much of a problem unless you can't find anything else for the cord to loop around. The two twisting strands were very helpful--no clips required. The only challenge I ran into was finding places to hook the cords onto--I had to get a bit creative with curtain rods and window bars, and it won't stretch across an entire room--but that is to be expected. Overall, I highly recommend.

product_name: Panache PS Sport High Impact Sports Bra 2001: Apparel
title: AMAZING!
review_text:
After having my baby, my bust increased by four cup sizes to a "G" and I could not find anything supportive enough to workout in (baby fat is not so easy to lose).
This solved my problem. It is strong and comfortable and takes care of the cleavage problem. Keeps the "girls" from bouncing around while running and exercising. I recommend this highly for busty women who desire support. It is worth the money. And if, like me, you need a bigger band size than they offer... buy bra extenders

product_name: Misses Coral Bay Golf Microfiber Wrinkle Resistant Short: Apparel
title: The best shorts
review_text: I love these shorts.  They look great, wear well, and make me look good

product_name: Easy Spirit Women's Mach Classic Walking Shoe.: Apparel
title: I hate shoes!!!! but these are ok!
review_text: As a person with short wide feet, I have a terrible time finding shoes that fit and are comfortable.  These are really comfortable walking shoes, neat enough to pass in a business-casual environment

product_name: Danshuz Deluxe Dyeable Ballet Shoe: Apparel
title: great shoe
review_text: I wanted a flat shoe for my wedding and didn't want to pay the 45.00 for the ones with full soles. This shoe will do the trick. I would probably like it even more if I could dance

product_name: Danshuz Deluxe Dyeable Ballet Shoe: Apparel
title: A tad too small...
review_text: Description says to order 2 sizes smaller than street shoe. I normally wear a 6.5 and ordered a 4.5. They are just a little bit too small. I should have ordered 1.5 sizes smaller than street shoe. Other than that, no complaints! They are great shoes

product_name: US Luggage Dual-Access Rolling Computer Case: Apparel
title: Outstanding Online Experience
review_text: Great all-around order experience.  Immediate shipment, rapid delivery and product was exactly as described on website.  Top quality material, same for workmanship.  Meets my need for transporting widescreen notebook and accessories.  Will do business with US Luggage again

product_name: Skechers Collection Men's Cities-Chicago Boot: Apparel
title: good boot for good price
review_text: This boot is neatly styled, if somewhat undersized. A a good deal for a GOOD PRICE -suggest you order one half to a full size larger than what you normally wear for most comfortable fit

product_name: Skechers Collection Men's Cities-Chicago Boot: Apparel
title: Good shoe, but get  a larger size!
review_text:
This is a good deal, but as others have stated, it is smaller than normal. The last time I got a pair of Skechers it was 8 Â½, so I figure I'd order 9 this time based on the other reviews. That was a mistake. I returned it for a 10 and it fits fine. So order 1 to 1 Â½ size larger.

This is my fist dress boot and I noticed that they do not fit as snug as slip-ons, but that's probably inherent in the boot design itself. Anyway, the boot is well constructed. The heel and sole look like they are hard, but they are very soft, so it is comfortable

product_name: Skechers Collection Men's Cities-Chicago Boot: Apparel
title: Skechers
review_text: With the price, this is a great pair of low ankle boots.  I was thrilled by the quality and style when I received the product.  I bought a pair of Kenneth Cole boots (same style) with the price of $100 but the material was so cheapy

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Can't beat it!
review_text: These socks save my mornings from pulling out my hair!  My daughter is a fanatic when it comes to seams and it was well worth it to me to spend a few extra dollars and get all seamless socks.  She won't wear any of her other socks now

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Scored a 10!
review_text: My Mom has looked for seamless socks for a long time.  I found these and ordered her a set for Christmas.  She loves them so much that she has already put in a request for Mother's Day and her birthday.  Oh and she put the red pair in a white load of clothes by mistake and she said that it just made her sick because she thought they would be ruined but they did not fade or blotch at all.  She was really impressed

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Socks that saved my life
review_text: Every morning my son would be so upset because he hated to put on his socks with seams in them.  Thank goodness we found TicTacToe Seamless socks.  They are excellent and morning is now a happy time

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: ATTN: Parents of Kids w/sensory issues
review_text: These socks are wonderful!! My daughter is 11 and in the Autism spectrum. Socks in general feel bad to her. She can feel the seam at the toe. The key is to buy handlinked seams, which these are. They are soft and made well. My only concern is as my daughter ages her feet are getting bigger, will the sizes go that big? I hope so!!!! Great socks!!!

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Best ever!
review_text:
If you are looking for socks that fit your foot and don't stretch out of shape, these are the ones!  And no seams at the toe.  They are perfect.
Have spent so many $$ on so many pair of socks and then given or thrown them away due to poor fit, it was such a pleasure to find these

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: the best sock ever!
review_text: wow! just with this sock and my morning are good again... my daugther is happy again and no more the sock are "auchi".

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Amazon stands for Amazing
review_text: Putting on socks for my daughter was always a nightmare for both of us.  She would kick and scream, "Line! Line! Line!!!" Socks and shoes would go flying across the room and we would both break down in total frustration.  So I looked up the seamless socks on Amazon and found these.  I checked out the reviews and decided to buy.  The triple pack of just white socks was not available in my daughter's size.  Being the desperate mom that I was, I opted for the pink, ivory, and white combo.  They came to my home within a week.  Mornings have never been so good.  Needless to say I am back on the internet ordering more.  These socks are just amazing.  Who knew that putting on socks was no big deal

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: the only socks my son will wear!
review_text: Having never worn them myself, I can't testify to these socks' greatness from personal experience, but my super-picky son will wear nothing else

product_name: TicTacToe Seamless Toe Triple Roll Socks, Three-pack: Apparel
title: Happy Mornings!
review_text:
Mornings used to be filled with the cries of my daughter rolling around on the floor flinging socks and demanding to wear flip-flops in the middle of winter.
Then I found the TicTacToe Seamless Toe Socks.
These are great for kids who are sensitive about toe seams.
Good quality product. Good value.
And best of all my mornings are now peaceful and filled with smiles!

product_name: Women's Naturalizer Mae - Coffee Bean Leather: Apparel
title: Great looking, comfortable shoe!
review_text: This is a really comfortable shoe.  I would definatly recommend it to anyone who needs to look professional while walking a lot.  I have to walk outside, up and down hills and this shoe feels like a sneaker.  The heel is not too high and it has great cushion.  I have been wearing it for a couple of months and it still is in great shape.  Great buy

product_name: Women's Naturalizer Mae - Coffee Bean Leather: Apparel
title: Wonderful quality shoe
review_text:
I can highly recommend this shoe, I also own it in brown croc, and they are wonderful. I am VERY picky with shoes, they HAVE TO be comfortable, HAVE TO look good and I need to be able to wear them for extended periods of time without any problems, such as blisters, discomfort or that my feet begin to sweat.
If you have senistive feet like me, you will love these shoes

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: for that fan in your family
review_text: I got the NFL folding tail gate chair to enjoy those times in the park and ball field and especially at draft day for the NLF. waiting on line for hours dressed in your favorite team outfit (Go Vikings) to show support. and nothing shows it more then relaxing on line sitting in these football folding chairs in your teams color and emblem. it does beat standing for hours or sitting on a cold dirty sidewalk

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: giant chair
review_text: I think the chair is great sturdy and exactly what I was looking for in my game roo

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: NFL Arm Chair
review_text: I was very pleased with this chair. It is well built and VERY comfortable.The receiver of the gift is very happy. I would biuy this again

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: NFL Adult arm chair
review_text: This is very portable and at the same time very sturdy.  Perfect for the patio or to take to grandson's soccer games

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: Chairs Manufactured by this Company are Defective
review_text:
I purchased six of these chairs in August for myself and my friends before the start of the college football season for tailgaiting.  They were all made by this manufacturer (North Pole) and had different NFL logos on them (I only bought one through Amazon, the others were bought through different companies due to availability issues).

At the first game of the season, my chair (Steelers) broke.  At the second game of the season, two more chairs (Bengals and Broncos) broke.  They were not misused and no weight limits were exceeded.  They all broke in the same exact place; the plastic pieces at the base of the legs all cracked.  Therefore, 3 out of 6 broke within probably less than 3-5 hours.

Needless to say, at $25-$30 each I would recommend prospective buyers to spend their money elsewhere

product_name: NFL Adult Steel Frame Chair: Apparel
title: Love it!
review_text: Thanks, Amazon.  Product arrived before I expected it.  My boyfriend LOVES his Redskins chair.  Right now, he's got it set up in his backyard...this gift may haunt me.  I may be seeing this chair for years to come on every beach, park, or park outing.  As of now, I am winning the argument that it shouldn't be used in our tv room

product_name: HUE Women's Faux Shearling Fairisle Shue: Apparel
title: Good for a cold winter
review_text: Slippers are nice and comfortable, but I should caution that they run slightly small. I'm a 9.5 and the large size is snug for me

product_name: Keds Women's Robyn Stain Resistant Mule: Apparel
title: Ked's mules
review_text: Almost too comfortable to be believed. It's like slipping your feet into a cloud. Don't waste your money on bargain basement imitations

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: It's REAL!!!!
review_text: I own many Prada Items, Purchased from NM and Saks. I bought this as a Gift. It came the other day in a huge UPS box. All you have to do is look at the workmanship and the Leather engraved Prada label inside the bag to know that it's the real deal. This is a closeout price, happens all the time.

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Honeymoon or Beach Vacation--SUMMER TIME!!!
review_text:
I love my PRADA bag!  Seems genuine to me, ladies and gents.  What a neat wedding shower gift this would make for the bride to take on her honeymoon!  This beach tote is adorable and well made.  Even though it's plastic, the trim is a bright red leather that looks great.  I wish they still had the FISH one in stock, I might get that, too.  

The bag is HUGE and came packaged in a GINORMOUS box. Even though the other reviews mentioned the size, I still was not prepared.  The bag is one large compartment with no "interior" compartments, so it's practical for a day at the beach.  I can fit a huge beach towel, sandals, a book, my INSTYLE magazine, sunblock, a water bottle, and a wristlet inside.  You'll definitely want to bring a seperate "wristlet" or wallet/coin purse along with you to keep inside.  I can't wait to bring this bag on my honeymoon!  

The handbag came with an authentication card, the original ITALIAN price tag (it really WAS 500 Euros!), and a dust bag for storage.  It looks genuine with the "PRADA" triangle tag on one side and a leather "PRADA label inside the bag... the labeling is subtle and not at all "in your face".  Perfect gift!  The only reason I gave it a 4 star rating is that I would have preferred the FISH one with the orange trim, but I think it's out of stock.  Still, this is an unimaginably great price for a Prada bag.  Happy Shopping!

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Great value
review_text: Okay.  Maybe it's real, maybe it's not.  I LOVE IT.  It's still a great looking bag for the price.  Comes with all the authenticity for those who care.  For those that don't -- It's fun; It's huge; It's fashion-forward.  A great bang for the buck

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Prada Printed Plastic Tote
review_text: I love this bag!  I purchased it to take to the Miami boat show.  I used it as my carry on for the plane.  It was roomy enough to hold my purse and whatever else I needed.  It was also pliable to slip under the plane seat.  Everyone asked where I got it.  I also used it as a beach tote!  This was a great purchase

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Beautiful tote bag, great price!
review_text: Highly recommend this - you cannot get a nicer tote from Prada at this price

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: very satisfied
review_text:
I sent this bag to my friend as a surprise for her birthday  and she was overwhelmed.  She is a beach babe and said it is just perfect for her.  Pronounced it adorable and very chic.
I want one too

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Super cute tote!
review_text: It is really cute, and playful just like funtote or marimekko bags

product_name: Prada Women's Printed Plastic Tote with Leather Trim: Apparel
title: Beautiful Bag
review_text: Talk about being the envy at the beach or pool. I received my bag and tore into the box. I was so excited. The bag was beautiful. Being a Prada expert this is a true Prada Bag. The detail and leather trim was beautiful. Makes a great gift at this price. WOW!!!

product_name: Hanky Panky Stretch Lace Thong 4811: Apparel
title: So comfortable
review_text: These undies are not only attractive, but are extremely comfortable.  They also don't give you ugly "muffin tops", if you know what I mean.

product_name: Tiered peasant dress: Apparel
title: Lovely peasant dress, but yes, it's more brown than purple
reviewer: Denise Van Slyke "Lover of all things bright and beautiful"
review_text:
Have to disagree with first reviewer; this dress is what it says it is. It's a PEASANT DRESSS, made of GAUZE. Not sure what else one might expect, but there's no problem with quality. It's lightweight, the seams are all finished in a rough, peasant-y kind of way, and the gauze is, well, gauze-y.

It's a lovely dress. Grazes the ankle. Lots of give in the elastic midsection (order up a size if you're large-chested). 

Make sure you've got a good strapless bra, because you'll want to wear it off-shoulder

product_name: Tiered peasant dress: Apparel
title: Nice, Summer dress, good price( It is Brown, not Eggplant)
review_text:
First of all- This dress is BROWN, not Eggplant.

Other than that, it is a very nice summer dress. I received it very quickly, with no problems.

The fabric is a nice, thick, gauzy cotton. 

The sizes tend to run a bit small with some of the things from this company, but not with all of their items.

product_name: Fossil Mens Wallet - Aviator Sliding 2 in 1 (Color: Brown): Apparel
title: Fossil Wallet
review_text: If you like wallets that have a sliding compartment than you will like this one a lot. When i first got it i felt that the material wasnt very good, but now that i have worn it in its great.

product_name: RIGGS WORKWEAR by Wrangler Men's Work Horse Jean: Apparel
title: A Great Pair of Jeans
review_text: I am a homeowner who lives in the country and is constantly fixing something.  Whether it's woodworking or small construction projects, I tend to stress jeans in three places, the right pocket where my tape measure slides on, the back pockets, and the crotch area.  The Riggs jeans are reinforced in all three areas.  Also, I am 6'7" and weigh 260 lbs.  Needless to say, it is difficult to find clothes that fit.  I read about Wrangler's Riggs jeans in a magazine article about work clothing and decided to try them.   The jeans I bought were size 40x36.  I have been wearing them now for two months and have no complaints.  The cloth is thicker and hardier than normal jeans, something I found helpful when cutting trees for firewood.  The pockets are deeper (something I very much appreciate), and the build quality of the jeans is excellent - triple stitching in all the important areas.  I think the part that really tops the whole deal off is the price.  These jeans were priced at $27 with free shipping.  Excellent product, excellent price.  What more can I say

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Not what I thought it would be
review_text: I had owned a pair of Sketchers a few years back and was happy with the brand then.  When I got these shoes I was surprised to see that they were not to the quality standards that I remembered.  I like lace-less shoes, but these were not adjustable, so for my narrow foot they didn't fit and they were still hard to get on.  I decided to send them back within 10 min

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Excellent Pair of Shoes! (cute too)
review_text: I wanted something different in a pair of shoes, so I ordered these fun orange colored shoes. THEY are awesome! One of the best pairs of shoes I have ever owned. They fit nice, it is weird the first time you put them on because there is no tongue or laces on the shoe. Take a little to get used to. BUT they are really comfortable. Great buy

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Love them!  Very comfortable
review_text: I love these shoes!  They are very comfortable and go great with my jeans and sweatpants.  They need to fit perfectly because their is no shoelace to tie so make sure you get your correct size (I am usually a 7.5 - 8 so I chose the 7.5 and they fit fine)

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Width not adjustable.
review_text: I normally wear 9.5-10 in sneakers and I bought the 10 just in case.  It fits snugly.  I failed to realize that the laces are not able to be loosened so the width of these shoes is too narrow for my wide foot.  I usually only buy wide in dress shoes so if this is your case don't get.  I am going to keep and hopefully they will "relax" a little if not I might cut off the bungee lace and see if that helps.  Very cute shoe, worth the trouble if it ends up working out

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Great shoes !
review_text: I may get the 4th pair soon. I also found the same model, in different colors at SEARS on sale for $39.99 plus tax. I gave 4 stars because they are not as cushy

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: loveshoes
review_text: These shoes are very comforable and easy to wear. I love these shoes. I bought another pair in blue and beige. I wear them for exercising such as walking

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: Most comfortable shoes!!
review_text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever owned.  I love them and I get lots of complements on them as well.  They look great with jeans too, that's the main reason I got them.  I'm buying another pair cause I never want to wear any other pair of shoes.  I have the off white and they seem to go with anything almost.

product_name: Skechers USA Women's Straightaway Sneaker: Apparel
title: They feel like slippers
review_text: I just bought these black shoes, after having the tan ones for about 5 months.  These are so very comfortable.  They feel like ballet slippers.  They do not have much rubber under the front half of the shoe, but have a decent amount under the heel.  They are easy to slip on and off, and i have gotten a good amount of complements on the tan ones.

product_name: adidas Men's Response Cushion 2006 Running Shoe: Apparel
title: ehh - they're ok.
review_text:
Pros: Great cushioning / support! Simple design, and not too flashy. Very breathable, allowing plenty of air circulation around your foot.

Cons: Not really comfortable. They seem to really wrap around your foot, which is fine if you go out for a run; but for walking / everyday life, you can't really let your feet 'rest'. I did have minor chafing (back of the foot) after the first run in them

product_name: adidas Men's Response Cushion 2006 Running Shoe: Apparel
title: Nice running shoes
review_text:
These sneakers are great for people who don't want allot of flash but want to be able to go for a walk or jog. I have never had any comfort issues with any Adidas running shoes. A great nice pair of everyday sneakers.
 Great buy

product_name: adidas Men's Response Cushion 2006 Running Shoe: Apparel
title: nice shoes for running, less for walking
review_text: Got the shoes one week ago, I found that the shoes are very good for running, as it's pretty springy. But not very good for walking, with the narrow bottom. It is also pretty airy inside, perfect for my sweaty feet

product_name: Women's Skechers Bikers Escape: Apparel
title: Comfy and cute!
review_text: The Skechers Bikers Escape is a veratile option for the sensitive footed. Decent arch support for my tiny, flat feet, with enough cushioning to keep them happy for hours of shopping! Initially, the band across the instep can be a little tight and had a touch of a heel rub, but both have improved during the break in period. They seem to dress up a pair of jeans, and so far have gotten away with wearing them with a skirt...hee hee! Bought a pair in brown as well!

product_name: Columbia Men's Northway Jacket: Apparel
title: Columbia for the win!
review_text:
This is a steal, can't imagine a single con about this jacket.
Water resistant, ventiled, comfortable, interior pockets are excelent.

Perfect for moderate cold and moderate rain.

Just ordered my second one.
Columbia = Quality

product_name: Columbia Men's Northway Jacket: Apparel
title: Great fit, bad zipper placement.
review_text: This Jacket fits very nicely. It is impressively waterproof, while still is breathable. It is fairly warm, which makes it good for colder weather but not so good as a casual jacket. The only major flaw is the fount outside pockets have zippers around the openings so when you take your hands in or out of them it scrapes against you, which is discouraging enough to inhibit the use of those pockets

product_name: Girls Mid-weight Tight: Apparel
title: Girls tights
review_text: I bought both the ivory and the white colored mid-weight tights.  There is not much difference in the colors so if you are looking for a truly ivory, off-white colored tight, do not get this one.  However quality-wise, it is a good tight.  My daughter wore a size 2T clothes and these tights were sized 1-3 and they fit her very nicely.  They aren't as thick as I thought they would be but they are opaque (definitely not thin or cheap) and are made from a strong material--my daughter loves to run, and as a result, fall, and she hasn't ripped them yet. So overall I was pleased with these tights

product_name: Tribeca Women's New Music Sandal: Apparel
title: Very high, but comfortable
review_text: The heels on these shoes are very high (a full 5"). I have had no problems with them though and they are actually quite comfortable.

product_name: Lock Laces(gray): Apparel
title: Lock Laces rock!
review_text: I'm an amateur triathlete and busy girl on the go and I love (all of) my Lock Laces.  I've pretty much replaced the laces on all of my shoes with these (and not just my running ones!)  I have to say, I really like the elasticity and secure grip they provide across the top of my foot.  They're snug, but not constricting so I never experience numb toes or pinching anywhere

product_name: Lock Laces(gray): Apparel
title: good quality
review_text: These are of good quality and I like the lock, it's not too big and does not look like something that will break easily. They also come with instructions on how to use them. I bought them for my 7 and 8 year old kids too and they like them

product_name: Wide-leg pants: Apparel
title: Plenty of breathing room!
review_text: I purchased the wide-leg pants just because of the wide leg! I have purchased other items that claimed to be wide-leg but I am happy to report that these truly are! I could have gone a size smaller and still be comfortable wearing them around home, to run a quick errand, and of course to exercise in! They are light weight, full cut pants that should come in every color. You won't be disappointed

product_name: Kenneth Cole Women's Bow Knows Wedge Sandal: Apparel
title: very happy :)
reviewer: Cheese_Cake "have a great day in stuff"
review_text: Well I got a great deal on them :) Adorable pair sure to add a spark to my shoe collection. Fit perfectly, comfy. I wore them once to the party and can't wait for summer to wear them more often. Very feminine look. Worth every penny! :

product_name: Boston Traveler Polar Fleece Top w/ Deerskin Palm and Thinsulate lining Winter Glove: Apparel
title: Good Fit ,Well Made, Very Warm
review_text: I love the warmth of these gloves, esp. with liner glove. They don't feel bulky and seem to be holding up better than another brand of thinsulate fleece gloves I have

product_name: Hungry Hip Scarves, Economy Imperfect: Apparel
title: imperfections MINOR, great price
review_text: These scarves have a nice jingle, one had a tiny run that is not visible when worn. They are a GREAT value at this price, perfect for practice or even a costume. Most coin/belly dance scarves run about thirty dollars, for comparison.

product_name: Carlos by Carlos Santana Women's Prospect Slingback: Apparel
title: Carlos Santana
review_text: Look at this shoe!  It speaks for itself, plus it has shimmer and shine and it glitters

product_name: Carlos by Carlos Santana Women's Prospect Slingback: Apparel
title: Fabulous!!
review_text: These shoes rock!  They are stunning!  They run true to size.  I had seen them at Macy's for $99 but didn't think I should splurge.  What a great price!

product_name: Carlos by Carlos Santana Women's Prospect Slingback: Apparel
title: Nice shoes
review_text: Shoes are very pretty.  I wore these all Christmas Eve day/night, by the end of the day my feet needed a break.  They fit true to size.

product_name: Lee Jeans Misses Mid Rise Bootcut: Apparel
title: Love the new Lee!
review_text: These are great jeans!  Perfect fit.  Comfy.  Very comparable to my fav Levis these days.  To me they are now interchangeable - which I never thought I would say

product_name: Lee Jeans Misses Mid Rise Bootcut: Apparel
title: Comfy & Sassy
review_text: Falling just at the mid-rise, it holds in any unwanted bulge sightings...and stretchy just enough so it fits to a more slender leg/thigh.  FINALLY, comfortable fit & fashion all in one

product_name: Suunto Mosquito Wrist-Top Dive Computer: Apparel
title: Suunto Mosquito
review_text: This dive computer might not have more functions than the others on the market but it has something that none of the others have, user replaceable batteries!!! and its smaller than the other ones

product_name: Men's James Dean Style Zipper Leather Jacket: Apparel
title: Elegant
review_text: The jacket is very elegant and I can use it with any clothes. I recommend it 100%

product_name: adidas Originals Women's Adilette Slide: Apparel
title: Very comfortable
review_text: Love this pair! they are form fitting to my feet and the material feels soft against my skin. When I walk to the beach, they don't slide around. They feel stable and solid. When my feet are wet or sandy I still feel comfortable! They're well made and will last a long time! Despite being striped (which I think is a selling feature), they go with everything and are very stylish

product_name: adidas Originals Women's Adilette Slide: Apparel
title: Adidas shoes
review_text: These shoes are so comfortable, with plenty of arch support for my high arches. I bought my first pair as a freshman in college, and they lasted for 7 years. Now I'm on my second pair!

product_name: adidas Originals Women's Adilette Slide: Apparel
title: Best sports shoes ever!
review_text: I've had three pairs of these in the last 10 years and I love them.  Note: Be sure to order one whole size larger than your shoe size - for some reason I think they started making them smaller recently.

product_name: 3D Animal Friends Booties: Apparel
title: So Sweet, They'll give you a toothache but baby's toes will be warm!
review_text: I had a big newborn and these were too big for her little legs at first, but they fit great and are among the few socks/booties/shoes that stay on for a long time, are soft, cute and go with many outfits. They have rattles in them, so they are like a toy, too. Tooo cute!!! I love them

product_name: Butterfly Lace Up Panty: Apparel
title: Cute and Pretty Darned Enticing
review_text: I really like the look of these panties all lacy and feminine. They feel good on, look great and best of all, they're low cut so you can were them with your jeans riding low on your hips. And if a bit of panty does peek out all the better, cuz these are so cute. Pretty darned enticing too, if you know what I mean

product_name: Butterfly Lace Up Panty: Apparel
title: Stylish and Nice, Hot Looking too

title: Belts Are Great, But.......
review_text: The belts are great quality and thicker than the belts I bought before. Only problem is their customer service is awful. I ordered 2 belts and they sent me the wrong size, but still charged me the higher amount. Forget about trying to contact them it's worthless. I will never buy from them again

product_name: Military Color Web Belts - 44" or 54" or 64" / Military Belt / Uniform Belt: Apparel
title: Excellent for the price.
review_text:
Well, why not? You've got a very decent amount of colour choices, and you can pick between a brass and silver buckle. I picked the silver & black combination, when it shipped it was more then I expected; for the same exact thing at a local mall you would pay twice as much and that's not considering tax. The only difference between this one and other belts of similar design that I've seen is that they all seem to have logos, either engraved or cut out. I don't enjoy sporting I giant logo on my waist. I much rather get what I want AND pay less for it. 

The buckle is not a design that opens and closes, rather you slip the belt through the buckle and tighten it by sliding a metal bar foward. If you close it tightly enough, it will hold a LOT of weight, far more then the open/slip belt through/close buckle on belt design. I carry a bunch of things on mine, including a heavy multi-tool, a knive, a phone, several pouches filled with a various manner of junk, a tape measure, and occasionally heavy construction tools. Granted the belt wasn't meant for this kind of weight but...normally after a few minutes my old buckle would just pop open from the weight...no such problem here. 

It opens and closes without trouble and will fit a large waist easily. What more do you want from a belt?! =) 

Andrew Christian were speedy enough in shipping it; it came a few days after my Amazon order, which was 3-5 business days. Great deal

product_name: Genuine Leather Attache Case - 15" Leather Briefcase: Apparel
title: Great buy
review_text: I've had this briefcase for about a month now. It's held up perfectly so far. The closure mechanisms are not buckles, but clips behind the buckles. It's been roomy enough to put a palm pilot, pens, and multiple files with papers. The leather looks great and it's very light. The shoulder strap is also comfortable. Assuming it contiues to hold up for a reasonable length of time, I'd buy this product again. One note: If you are looking to store a laptop in this briefcase, I'd think twice. It's not as large as most laptop briefcases and definately does not have adequate padding in my opinion. But for carrying documents, books and other items, it has met all my expectations

product_name: Intimo Men's Classic Silk Pajamas: Apparel
title: Best Quality I Have Found
review_text:
These silk pajamas, in my opinion, have much higher quality stitching, tailoring details, as well as a heavier weight silk than the closely priced DreamSacks pajamas.  

Sizing Help:

To help clarify sizing for people (there have been conflicting reviews here), I ordered a Medium but then returned it for a L.  I will probably get some minor alterations, but I don't blame the company for that...everyone is shaped differently.

I am 6'0" and weigh 175.  My suit measurements are a 42" chest, 34" sleeves, and 32" pants inseam.  The Medium body fit but the sleeves and pants were too short.  The Large was the best fit overall, although roomier around the chest than I would prefer.  But if you are my size the Large is your best option.

review_text: These are great . Well made, did ok in the wash. They also did not split at the seam after wearing them 2x . They are still cool enough for summer, but nice and warm in winter and SERIOUSLY SOFT !!!!!! By a pair for your wife,yourself They are heaven

title: I would highly recommed these...very nice!
review_text:
I was concerned that these silk PJ's would be really thin and on the cheap side. But to my surprise, they are much thicker then I thought they would be and feel like they will hold up rather well.  

My husband did NOT expect these and is quite pleased with them.  I am back tonight to order another pair in a different color now that I know they are worth the money I paid for them. Plus the fit was perfect.  I noticed others here said their large was to big so get a smaller size...and another person said the opposite.  (That confused me when I went to buy.) So I just went with my husbands normal size which is a XXL and it was absolutely perfect!  :)  My husband loves the feel of them and said this is by far is nicest pair of PJ's ever.  

The size is perfect, color bright & looks like it will hold up after many washings. Seams looked like quality sewing unlike some I have bought in the past.  I can't find anything I don't like about these.  

I need to get another pair here FAST before he wears these out. lol  Anyone thinking of buying these I can't help but think you will be quite pleased to say the least. 

Ja

title: A tiny, leather purse - just what I wanted!
review_text:
I've been looking for a small leather purse for quite a while. My idea of "small" is obviously a lot smaller than most. I saw this purse, read the dimensions and figured it would be perfect - and it is! I'm very happy with it. 

It is well made. Nicely stitched inside and out. The strap is adjustable. 

The leather is soft, flexible and smooth. It smells great too! The hardware is sturdy and a dull brushed, silver color. 

I bought the black... and I'm thinking about getting the red one too! I wish it came in green.

If you want a bag to cram stuff in... don't buy this. It will only fit the essentials! If you want a tiny purse that isn't the "wallet on a string" type - this is it!

product_name: Le Mystere Dream Tisha Seamless Full Fit Bra: Apparel
title: not ugly; check the size
reviewer_location: deep in the heart of Texas
review_text:
I don't think this is an ugly bra, just plain, plain, plain, which is what I was looking for.  The bra is sleek and doesn't show though.  The shaped cups give a beautiful silouette.  It does feel more substantial, but not like body armor.  Honestly, it is wonderful to have the support I need without feeling like I'm wearing "old lady" underwear.  The low rise lets me wear scoop neck tops.

I did have some frustration over figuring out the correct size.  I wear a 34DDD in Wacoal, but a 36F in Le Mystere.

product_name: Le Mystere Dream Tisha Seamless Full Fit Bra: Apparel
title: Beautiful and busty bra, prevents nipple show-through
review_text: The slightly padded molded cups on this bra are wonderful to prevent nipples from showing through - even if you're cold, if you get my drift.  As a buxom woman (36DDD), I'm cursed with "wandering" nipples, bra lines showing through shirts and sweaters, bossoms that "swing low" and other embarrassing problems. This bra is relatively comfortable generally speaking, and it is VERY comfortable compared to minimizers and other "hold'em up and hold'em in place" bras. Personally, I think the svelt look of the bra is gorgeous.  With a big chest, I've never been able to wear those lacy little bras from Victoria's Secret, so this is actually a big improvement over what my husband refers to as "industrial strength" bras like our grandmothers wear. I only give it four stars because the underwire is not comfortable if you sit for long periods of time at a desk like I do; it begins to "dig in" a bit right beneath the rib cage.  Overall, it's a great bra to (1) hide nipples, (2) provide your breasts with a wonderfully rounded shape, (3) hides bra lines (great t-shirt bra), and (4) show off your cleavage but not the bra itself (if you wear a low cut blouse). I think you'll like it; and remember, you tend to get what you pay for these days.  The days of $18 bras are far behind us

product_name: Le Mystere Dream Tisha Seamless Full Fit Bra: Apparel
title: Great bra!
review_text:
I first purchased this bra in a specialty bra boutique for 139.00CA. I know it's a lot for a bra, but I was too happy that I found a bra that fit great. Up until that day I wore a 36D or 36DD, after getting fitted I am now a 32 G. You have to understand that I hate shopping for bras, I never found the right one and always walk out of the store thinking that I should get a breast reduction. 
This bra is the one that Oprah wears and loves. Now it is my favourite thing. 
I have to agree with the other customers that it is not the prettiest bra if you are a bigger chested gal like my self, but you forget about that when you put a t-shirt or blouse on, because you really do look 10 pounds thinner around the waist and you chest is where it should be. 
If you are a bigger chested gal, I would suggest before buying this bra, if you are not too sure what size you are, go and get fitted at a proper store....a specialty store. Most stores only sell bras in the A-DD cup, that is why you should go to a specialty store, the sales women know a lot more

product_name: Bostonian Men's Tahoe Oxford: Apparel
title: This is a beautiful shoe .... but order a half size larger than your regular size
review_text:
This is a beautiful, well-made dress shoe that combines traditional oxford design with high quality materials. It features a smooth, full grain, blemishless, fully lined, leather upper, and a flexible leather sole with rubberized contact patches*. There is not much more that an Allen Edmonds, costing hundreds of dollars more, will get you.

I got one in size 15M, which is my normal shoe size. Size 15M in this shoe is relatively tight-fitting at the arch, in comparison to my Florsheim 15M oxfords (two different models). So, the gentleman that remarked in earlier comments about the size being a tad smaller is correct. If I had known, I would have gotten a half-size bigger. However, that would have added unnecessary shoe length when all I needed was a quarter inch of additional coverage at the arch. I wish shoe makers had an arch fitment scale like they have with the width of the foot, i.e., medium, wide, extra wide, etc.

* an earlier commenter mentioned that the rubberized outer lining on the sole started to come unglued after only a few months of wear; I cannot comment on this aspect yet as I have had these for only a few weeks yet, and have worn them only three or four time to date. I will update this review if I discover that I have this problem also

product_name: Birkenstock Arizona Birkibuc: Apparel
title: No shoe better for foot problems
review_text:
I had plantar fasciitis two years ago and the suede Arizona Birks were the only shoes I could wear comfortably for months. It took a couple of days to break the shoes in due to the firm footbed and heel cup, but once they were broken in, it was bliss. A good friend of mine recently had plantar fasciitis herself and also began wearing the Arizona Birks. Ever since my own PF episode, I've avoided going barefoot around the house and wear only the Arizona Birks while indoors. They've held up remarkably well, and I dread the day something accidentally happens to them which means I have to buy another pair of Arizonas just in case.

I know they're more expensive than most sandals -- mine cost $110 at a mall store -- but they're worth the money. I have flat feet, while my friend has a really high arch, yet the Arizona Birks work wonderfully for both of us. I now have about 12 pairs of Birkenstocks in a variety of styles, and plan on buying more. Birkenstocks give tremendous support with its toe grip and molded footbed, especially since it conforms to your foot within a few days. If you want the best variety of Birks, you should check out the QVC website. They have dozens of styles, and some of the best prices on Birkenstocks around

product_name: Birkenstock Arizona Birkibuc: Apparel
title: best in the world!
review_text: If you wear sandals this is the best ever, especially for your feet!  Just wear your birks a few hours a day to break them (and your feet)in.  Order one size smaller for proper fit.  Great service from ShoeBuy and Amazon

product_name: Birkenstock Arizona Birkibuc: Apparel
title: Best Sandals You Can Buy
review_text:
I have had many different types of sandals, but have never owned a pair of Birkenstocks.  I think the price is what has kept me from buying them and have always gotten sandals without reguard to who makes them as long as they were in the $20 range.  

After my last pair fell apart I decided to spend the extra money for Birkenstocks.  I am glad I did.  You can tell how well made they are right out of the box.  They are extremely comfortable to wear, and the footbed is firm but soft.  The longer you wear them the more comfortable they get.  I like the birkibuc material better than leather as it seems to be more water resistant.  The arch is solid and in just the right spot for proper support.  The part where the strap is attached to the sole is seamless and very well done.  

I am very happy about purchasing the sandals and I recommend them highly.  Your feet won't hurt wearing them all day like some sandals or flip flops.  One thing to watch out for, it says the size measures true but the first pair I ordered were much too big and I had to send them back for a smaller pair.  I used the conversion chart the seller has, but you may want to order a half or full size smaller than you normally would.  The ones I have now are size 41 and are supposed to be for size 8 US, but I am a true size 9 and these fit me with room to spare.

However, for bikinis, in cotton, these are just perfect.  I personally love  "Jockey" or if I must, I do like the Hanes microfiber.

product_name: Hanes Men's Classic Basic Brief, Three Pack: Apparel
title: The best briefs in town !!!
review_text:
Hanes makes an excellent white traditional brief for the gentlemen amongst us who just don't want to wear boxers. The relatively snug fit ensures that these briefs will not "bunch up" like loose fitting boxers so often do; and many men prefer these briefs for that reason alone.

The briefs are easy to care for; they are essentially permanent press so any washer and dryer set will clean them well. They seem to last forever, too, which makes them an excellent value.

If you can, try to get these without a tag in the rear so that you won't get an itch caused by the tag. However, even with a tag you usually don't feel any discomfort. I've worn 'em that way for years without a problem. The 100% cotton fibers of these briefs add to the comfort you'll feel, too. 

My only real caution--and the main reason that this product gets four stars instead of five--is that these briefs can be tight the first several times you wear them. This may be true for some of us men even if Hanes does claim that these briefs are preshrunk before they hit the store's shelves. I personally would suggest washing them once or twice just to loosen the fit up ever so slightly. Another relatively minor concern is that the elasticity of the waistband eventually does wear out. At that point you do need to buy new briefs--but, then again, nothing lasts forever, right?

Overall, gentlemen who want a close fitting brief that still gives them comfort will be very satisfied with these white men's briefs. The three pack gives you value and they last a long time.

title: Great Storage Poor Operation
review_text: We collect a lot of DVD's!  I was quite excited to file them in this system. We have a smaller version that DOES have the three rings. Huge mistake in changing that.  It is extremely difficult to file in DVD's in this storage system (the smaller one is great).  Also, to ensure the movie is protected we like to place the whole sleeve on top of the player and then refile after viewing.  Can't do that with this system.  Buy the pages individually and put them in your own three ring binder.

product_name: Case Logic DVD Album - 140 DVDs & 62 title notes: Apparel
title: This product poorly/inaccurately described!!
review_text: Having bought this I am disappointed to say that IT IS NOT 3 RING.  It has the 2 straps as shown in the photo.  It is not "a snap" to add pages and alphabetize your collection.  I would buy another  for the rest of our collection if it wasn't for that.  Adding and removing pages is a HUGE hassle.  Given it's size I like the carrying handle and the slots in the inside front cover for putting away discs quickly if you or more likely a lazy child does not want to search through the pages to put it back into its correct slot.
